title: Drawing
medium: Pen and ink, traces of graphite on coated wove paper
markings: Stamped in black ink at lower right : Museum for the Arts of Decoration/ Cooper Union (Lugt 457d)
provenance: Eleanor Garnier Hewitt and Sarah Cooper Hewitt
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Bouquet of two carnations and a tulip bound by a blue ribbon; bird perched on tulip; butterflies and insect fly above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
Pen and ink, traces of graphite on coated wove paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1923-22-25.
